Author: jwecker
Content: I hope these do well, but when I apply my internal "would I pay for it" measurement (I never click on ads [and try to ignore branding] so ad-based revenue sites don't make the cut) there was only one on that list that I myself would pay for- the first one, Garlik.  That's just me, though.

Author: jwecker
Content: hmm.  ambassador to France.  Anyway, the last line of the first paragraph is dead on.

Author: papersmith
Content:
Setting up a sole proprietorship is as easy as going to a business kiosk and filling out some forms.

I think in BC you don't even need to register if you use your own name, so it's completely free (money/bureaucracy).

Title: Gasoline powered shoes and why Silicon Valley works by way of contrast
